hero.subheadline: Terima tip tanpa tunai melalui Google Pay, GoPay atau kartu bank. Uang langsung masuk ke rekening Anda berkat TIPSIO.
hero.dialogDescription: Untuk memberikan tip atau ulasan, masukkan kode staf
hero.imageAlt: Antarmuka platform tip digital TIPSIO menampilkan staf dan opsi pembayaran

digitalMenu.title: Menu digital
digitalMenu.desc: Tampilkan foto hidangan dan otomatisasi pesanan

problem.title: Uang tunai semakin berkurang setiap tahun
problem.desc1: Tamu Anda ingin berterima kasih atas layanan tetapi merasa canggung ketika dompet mereka kosong. Tanpa cara yang nyaman untuk memberi tip, Anda kehilangan sebagian besar pendapatan staf.
problem.desc2: mengubah "Terima kasih, tapi saya hanya punya kartu" menjadi uang nyata untuk tim Anda.

howItWorks.title: Kontrol penuh dan transparansi
howItWorks.subtitle: Tiga langkah menuju tip digital yang aman

step1.label: Aman
step1.title: Midtrans Anda ‚Äî Aturan Anda
step1.desc: Hubungkan akun Midtrans Anda yang sudah ada. Kami tidak menyentuh uang ‚Äî transaksi langsung dari tamu ke Anda.

step2.label: Cepat
step2.title: Kode QR di mana-mana
step2.desc: Tempatkan QR di meja, folder tagihan atau lencana. Tamu scan ‚Üí pilih jumlah ‚Üí bayar.

step3.label: Adil
step3.title: Saldo pintar
step3.desc: Sistem menghitung berapa yang diperoleh setiap staf (atau pool bersama). Di akhir shift Anda melihat jumlah pembayaran yang tepat.

business.title: Bisnis: Retensi tim
business.desc: Tip yang baik adalah motivasi terbaik. Kurangi turnover dengan memberi staf cara legal untuk mendapatkan lebih dari tamu tanpa tunai.

team.title: Tim: Keadilan
team.desc: Pelayan melihat pendapatan mereka secara real time. Tidak ada perselisihan tentang siapa yang mendapat apa selama shift.

guests.title: Tamu: Kenyamanan
guests.desc: Tidak ada rasa bersalah karena tidak punya uang tunai. Bayar dalam 2 klik, biaya bisa diatur untuk dibayar tamu (di atas tip).

q1.q: Apakah saya perlu membuka rekening baru?
q1.a: Tidak, jika Anda sudah punya Midtrans, kami terintegrasi dengannya. Jika tidak ‚Äî kami akan membantu Anda terhubung.

q2.a: Tidak pernah. Secara teknis uang mengalir: Kartu tamu ‚Üí Midtrans Anda ‚Üí Rekening bank Anda. Kami hanya menyediakan infrastruktur IT.

q3.a: Saat ini layanan sepenuhnya gratis. Di masa depan, biayanya akan 5%, tetapi Anda dapat mengaturnya untuk dibayar oleh tamu (di atas jumlah tip).

q4.a: Tip (Service Charge / Gratuity) memiliki kekhususan di Indonesia. TIPSIO menyediakan laporan detail untuk akuntansi Anda agar semuanya sesuai.

q5.a: Hanya untuk memeriksa saldo. Untuk menerima tip, hanya perlu kode QR yang dicetak.

finalCta.subtitle: Setup memakan waktu kurang dari satu jam. Kami akan membantu di setiap langkah via WhatsApp.

hero.title: Tip digital yang benar-benar berfungsi untuk venue Bali
hero.subtitle: Tamu scan QR dan meninggalkan tip dalam hitungan detik. Staf melihat setiap rupiah. Anda tetap memegang kendali ‚Äî dan selama pilot Bali kami, TIPSIO gratis untuk venue (biaya platform 5% direncanakan nanti).
hero.miniTrust: Dibangun di Midtrans. Tamu dapat membayar dengan GoPay, OVO, kartu dan Google Pay ‚Äî tanpa terminal tambahan, tanpa aplikasi baru untuk tamu.

heroNew.headline: Tip yang
heroNew.subheadline: Platform tip yang bekerja untuk venue, staf, dan tamu sekaligus: tamu membayar dalam hitungan detik, tim melihat saldo mereka, Anda tetap sepenuhnya transparan.
heroNew.trust2: Setup dalam waktu kurang dari satu jam
heroNew.trust3: Bekerja dengan metode pembayaran apa pun

impact.title: Nilai untuk tamu, staf, dan pemilik
impact.subtitle: Tip menjadi transparan untuk tim, mudah untuk tamu, dan terkontrol untuk pemilik.

owners.title: Untuk venue
owners.desc: Kontrol tip dan distribusikan secara transparan tanpa terminal tambahan.

team.title: Untuk staf

guests.title: Untuk tamu
guests.desc: Scan, pilih jumlah, bayar dengan Apple/Google Pay atau QRIS ‚Äî tanpa aplikasi.

valueDeck.title: Kami mencakup setiap sisi meja
valueDeck.subtitle: Setiap layar TIPSIO mencerminkan apa yang penting bagi tamu, staf, dan manajemen.

venues.title: Untuk venue
venues.point1: Aturan tip yang jelas tanpa integrasi POS atau hardware baru.
venues.point2: Dashboard yang mencerminkan back office: shift, pemimpin, dan jumlah per QR.
venues.point3: Gunakan pembayaran pool, berbasis peran, berbasis shift, atau personal ‚Äî aturan Anda, terdokumentasi.

staff.title: Untuk staf
staff.point1: QR dan lencana pribadi yang bisa Anda tunjukkan ke tamu dalam sekejap.
staff.point2: Saldo dan pembayaran mendatang tanpa spreadsheet tersembunyi.
staff.point3: Notifikasi push untuk setiap tip agar pertumbuhan terlihat.

guests.title: Untuk tamu
guests.point1: Tanpa terminal: bekerja dengan kamera ponsel dan Apple/Google Pay.
guests.point2: Antarmuka dalam bahasa tamu ‚Äî cepat dan tanpa formulir.
guests.point3: Preset pintar yang meningkatkan rata-rata tip tanpa tekanan.

productShowcase.title: Seperti apa TIPSIO
productShowcase.subtitle: Alur tamu yang ringan plus dashboard gelap yang kaya data.

guest.title: Layar tamu
guest.desc: Scan QR, pilih jumlah, dan bayar dengan Apple Pay, Google Pay, atau QRIS dalam hitungan detik.

dashboard.title: Dashboard venue
dashboard.desc: Kartu shift, pemimpin harian, kontrol pembayaran, dan notifikasi tip instan.

payouts.title: Alokasi
payouts.desc: Pembayaran adil berdasarkan peran, shift, atau mode personal ‚Äî terlihat oleh seluruh tim.

featuresNew.title: Features that hold up during a real shift
featuresNew.subtitle: Mobile, secure, and free of extra steps.

f1.title: Live QRs
f1.desc: QRs for tables and staff with dynamic links and print-ready layouts.

f2.title: Instant notifications
f2.desc: The team sees every tip right away ‚Äî motivation goes up.

f3.title: Dashboard without manual spreadsheets
f3.desc: See who brought what, what to pay out, and which shifts are growing.

f4.title: Anti-fraud and safety
f4.desc: Payments run through Midtrans and Apple/Google Pay. We never store card data.

f5.title: Multilingual UI
f5.desc: English, Indonesian, Russian ‚Äî guests and staff feel taken care of.

f6.title: Go live in an hour
f6.desc: Connect Midtrans, import staff, print QRs. You‚Äôre ready to accept tips.

journey.title: Onboarding
journey.subtitle: How TIPSIO fits into your day ‚Äî from setup to the first thank-yous.

s1.title: Launch
s1.desc: Connect Midtrans, set roles, print QRs for tables and badges.

s2.title: Live shift
s2.desc: Guests pay in 7 seconds, staff get notifications, you see shift trends live.

s3.title: Payouts and growth
s3.desc: Allocate by role or personally, close payouts, and spot trends to retain talent.

howNew.title: Simple by design
howNew.subtitle: Three steps to transform how your venue handles tips

step1.title: Connect your payments
step1.desc: Link your existing Midtrans account. Tips flow directly to you ‚Äî we never hold your funds.

step2.title: Guests scan and tip
step2.desc: Place QR codes on tables or staff badges. Guests pay with GoPay, OVO, cards, or QRIS in seconds.

step3.title: Track and distribute
step3.desc: See real-time analytics. Know exactly who earned what. Settle payouts with confidence.

features.title: Everything you need to grow
features.subtitle: We've thought through every detail so you can earn more.

f1.title: Apple Pay & Google Pay
f1.desc: One-click payment. No card forms or SMS. 40% higher conversion.

f2.title: Instant withdrawal
f2.desc: Money on your card in 30 seconds.

f4.title: Smart QR codes
f4.desc: Generate codes for individual staff or tables. Print-ready materials included.

f6.title: Multi-language support
f6.desc: Interface works in English and Indonesian. Perfect for mixed teams and international guests.

forVenues.title: Built for venue owners who care about their team
forVenues.desc: TIPSIO helps you create a fair, transparent tipping system that motivates staff and delights guests ‚Äî without changing your existing payment setup.
forVenues.point1: Increase tip volume with convenient cashless payments
forVenues.point2: Reduce conflicts with clear distribution rules
forVenues.point3: Retain staff with transparent earnings tracking
forVenues.point4: Make data-driven decisions with detailed analytics

ctaNew.title: Ready to modernize tipping at your venue?
ctaNew.subtitle: Join Bali's leading restaurants and cafes. Setup takes less than an hour.

owners.title: For venue owners
owners.point1: Increase staff motivation without touching menu prices.
owners.point2: Connect via Midtrans ‚Äî no custom hardware or new terminals.
owners.point3: See all tips and payouts in one simple dashboard.

staff.title: For staff
staff.point1: Tips go into a transparent system, not a mysterious jar.
staff.point2: See what you earned and when payouts happen.

guests.title: For guests
guests.point1: No cash, no awkwardness at the table.
guests.point2: Scan, choose amount, pay in seconds ‚Äî no app required.

howItWorks.title: How TIPSIO works in 3 steps

step1.title: 1. Your venue connects Midtrans once
step1.description: You enter your Midtrans Merchant ID and API keys. We don't hold your money ‚Äî tips go directly to your existing payment account.

step2.title: 2. We generate QR codes for staff and tables
step2.description: Print them, place on tables or staff badges. Guests scan with any phone camera.

step3.title: 3. Guests leave tips, you settle payouts
step3.description: Guests pay with GoPay, OVO, cards or QRIS via Midtrans. TIPSIO calculates how much each staff member should get. You pay out in cash or bank transfer and mark payouts as done.

howItWorks.flowText: Guest ‚Üí Midtrans ‚Üí Your account ‚Üí Staff payouts, calculated in TIPSIO

whyBali.title: Built for Bali, not for "global" headlines
whyBali.point1: Works with QRIS, GoPay, OVO and cards via Midtrans ‚Äî no extra terminals or hardware.
whyBali.point2: Designed for mixed teams: local staff, expat owners, tourists from all over the world.
whyBali.point3: Mobile‚Äëfirst UI that behaves well even on spotty Wi‚ÄëFi.
whyBali.point4: Simple onboarding: connect Midtrans, add staff, print QRs ‚Äî ready in under an hour.

productPeek.title: See TIPSIO in action
productPeek.guestScreen: Guest tip screen ‚Äî scan a QR, tap an amount, pay.
productPeek.dashboard: Venue dashboard ‚Äî all tips and top staff at a glance.
productPeek.payouts: Payouts report ‚Äî know exactly who should get how much.

whereWeAre.title: Where we are now
whereWeAre.description: TIPSIO is live with early venues in Bali. We're focused on making digital tips easy for guests, transparent for staff, and low‚Äëfriction for owners.
whereWeAre.point1: We integrate with Midtrans and follow their best practices.
whereWeAre.point2: We keep staff dashboards and payouts logic simple and clear.
whereWeAre.point3: We work closely with early partners to refine the product.

q1.question: Do you touch our money or hold funds?
q1.answer: No. All payments go directly to your Midtrans merchant account. TIPSIO only helps you track and allocate tips to staff.

q2.question: Do guests need to install an app?
q2.answer: No. Guests just scan a QR code with their phone camera and pay via Midtrans ‚Äî GoPay, OVO, cards or QRIS.

q3.question: How do staff get paid?
q3.answer: You still pay your staff in cash or via bank transfer. TIPSIO calculates how much each staff member should get and shows it in a simple payouts report.

q4.question: How much does TIPSIO cost?
q4.answer: We keep our pricing simple for early partners. Midtrans fees apply as usual. Platform fee is discussed individually based on your volume.

q5.question: How long does setup take?
q5.answer: Most venues connect Midtrans, add staff and print QR codes in under 1 hour.

finalCta.title: Ready to try digital tips at your venue?
finalCta.subtitle: Connect TIPSIO, start with a few tables or one shift, and see how your staff responds.

ctaNew.title: The fastest way to tidy up tipping
ctaNew.subtitle: Connect TIPSIO, launch on a few tables, and watch how your team responds.
